item.title: Welcome Traveller
item.description: I‚Äôm Harsh. Welcome to my personal hypertext garden. I just started this garden, so the seeds and saplings are still growing. But check in every once in a while.

item.title: Asymmetric Risk
item.description: Heard about this first in the podcast My First Million with the guest Mohnish Pabrai. He describes it as: ‚ÄúHeads I win, Tails I don‚Äôt lose much‚Äù (I love this line) I am working on becoming someone who can both recognize and act on more asymmetric opportunities as I grow.
